sentence.Network_en: The yugoslav speak serbo croat, but I can not speak it.

sentence.Network_en: Language: The principal language is Serbo - Croat.

entry.tran: (前南斯拉夫使用的)塞尔维亚－克罗地亚语
entry.def: Serbo-Croat is one of the languages spoken in the former Yugoslavia.

means.word_mean: 1. the Slavic language of the Serbs and Croats; the Serbian dialect is usually written in the Cyrillic alphabet and the Croatian dialect is usually written in the Roman alphabet

auth_sentence.content: He had a Serb father and a Croat mother.
